episodes.title: Is Mary Cosby A Cult Leader? Rachel Zoe On Brad Goreski, Tom Brady & Alix Earle & Heated Rivalry
episodes.description:
Dive into the hottest celebrity tea and Real Housewives drama! 🍵 In this video, we break down the explosive allegations against RHOSLC star Mary Cosby – is she really running a cult at Faith Temple Pentecostal Church? We explore the shocking claims from former members, family, and the brand-new TLC docuseries *The Cult of the Real Housewife* (premiering Jan 1, 2026), including financial exploitation, public shaming, and more disturbing revelations.
 
Then, fashion icon Rachel Zoe spills on her long-standing fallout with former assistant Brad Goreski (yes, that decade-old feud is still going strong), plus thoughts on  Tom Brady and rising influencer Alix Earle hanging out on NYE?
 
And don't miss the buzz around HEATED RIVALRY!
00:00 Introduction 02:47 Exploring Mary Cosby's Cult Allegations 39:04 Tragic News: The Death of Victoria Jones 42:22 Couple News: Kyle Richards and Mauricio's Reunion? 44:11 Unexpected Romance: Tom Brady and Alix Earle 47:20 Controversial Couple: Denise Richards and Aaron Pfeiffer 56:29 The Fallout: Rachel Zoe and Brad Goreski's Relationship 01:01:46 TV Recommendations: Heated Rivalry on HBO Max
